name: Pledge Health
headline: Automated patient billing for independent healthcare clinics
description: Pledge automates patient billing for independent healthcare clinics. We estimate how much insurance will cover for each visit, so clinics can charge patients at the time of service, rather than waiting weeks for insurance to process.
generated_description:
Pledge Health is a fresh player in the healthcare technology space, founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's Winter 2023 batch. Their mission? To streamline patient billing for independent healthcare clinics through clever automation. By predicting insurance coverage for each visit, Pledge enables clinics to charge patients at the time of service—no more waiting around for weeks to get paid. This kind of efficiency is not just a convenience; it’s essential in today’s fast-paced healthcare landscape.

The company is headquartered in an unspecified location with a lean team of just two. Despite their size, they tackle an impressive scope of tasks, including benefits verification, cost estimations, and upfront payments, all powered by AI. This approach significantly reduces the administrative burden on clinics, allowing them to focus on what truly matters: patient care. Clients are already reaping the rewards, with claims that Pledge has saved them thousands of hours previously spent on tedious paperwork and follow-up communications.

Pledge Health’s platform focuses on automating insurance checks, securing high upfront patient responsibility rates (around 95%), and generating accurate estimates. The result? A smoother workflow for administrative teams, better patient understanding of bills, and timely payments that don’t leave practices hanging.

Their core strengths lie in the healthcare fintech sector, with a robust SaaS product that leverages innovative workflow automation. Security is a top priority, and Pledge operates in a HIPAA-compliant environment—an essential feature for any healthcare technology provider.

What’s even more compelling is the positive feedback from their users. Clinic managers and team leaders praise Pledge for boosting staff morale and improving patient satisfaction. By automating routine tasks and allowing personnel to focus more on relationships rather than paperwork, Pledge is setting a new standard for convenience in healthcare billing.

If you're curious about their services or want to see Pledge in action, they offer demos right on their website: [Pledge Health](https://www.pledge.health/). As they continue to grow, keep an eye on them; they’re carving out a significant niche in healthcare billing that could change how independent clinics operate.
